column3:
“I really like this Sour Poison.  Got it on the low for $30 1/8 from The Jazz Club in Detroit.  Shout out to Emmie, the bud-tender, who served me up with a nice smile.

It's a pretty green and orange flower.  Tastes sweet and earthy with diesel undertones.  Relaxation kicks in nicely after a cough or 2.  After 1/2 a blunt, I'm butting it out.  (:”
“Some of the best smoke ive had in awhile, instant effects after just one small toke. A+++”
“I've been through a lot of different types, & this is my favorite so fare !!!!!!!!!!!!!!”

“I know this one as Durban Sour. Or at least that's what the local dispensary is selling it as. Either way, HELLLLLOOOO NURSE! This takes all the energy of Durban and combines it with that slightly psychedelic effect Sour Diesel can give to create what is probably the most tippy weed I've ever had. THIS STUFF IS STRONG.  Like... being hit with a literal brick s-house, know what I mean? Make sure your belt is tightened...”
“I am dumb high  after a 2 gram blunt”
“very good for anxiety. as you come down the nice body buzz is still there to help ease into relaxation.”
“Great combination of both strains adding looks and tastes from both. Overall a very good sativa dominant strain in my opinion.”
“Sour Poison has been added to the archive. Very pungent, potent & pleasing. No edginess like you would get from a pure sativa. Very mellow; yet uplifting.”
